Headline: #26 South Shore Express, #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near South Shore Drive/80th
ShortDescription: NB 26 South Shore Express, 71 71st/South Shore  buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 83rd, Exchange. 79th and South Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #26 South Shore Express, #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 83rd, Exchange. 79th and South Shore Drive, due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/80th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at Indiana/127th
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temp. rerouted via Michigan, 115th, I-94 (Bishop Ford Expressway), 130th, and Eberhart, due to street blockage near Indiana/127th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, I-94 (Bishop Ford Expressway), 130th, and Eberhart, due to street blockage near Indiana/127th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/Garfield
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, Garfield, Halsted, 59th, and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, Garfield, Halsted, 59th, and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/Garfield.
